messages.message:
Hi Team, There is a feature request from Datafabricx for support for few languages.
```We would like to request support for Arabic and Hebrew languages in the Instabase document translation feature. Additionally, we kindly ask you to consider adding all the languages currently supported in Copilot to ensure broader translation capabilities.
This enhancement will significantly improve our ability to work with multilingual documents across various regions.```
ticket: https://instabase.zendesk.com/agent/tickets/9617
cc: @Nithin @arun
